alert.note: Alert for Cecil; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 2:56AM EST until January 03 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Cecil, Southern Baltimore and Southeast Harford Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. Precipitation may begin as a mix of rain, sleet, and snow, but precipitation will change to all snow by 6 am this morning. The heaviest snow will be through midday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility will be reduced to below one- half mile at times in heavier bands of snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
